title: Sketchbook Folio, "Two Standing Angels Holding Wreath", 1810–20
medium: Pen and brown ink, brown wash, over black chalk on white laid paper
inscribed: in pen and brown ink at lower left corner: 41; at lower right corner: Agostino Caracci Roma. On verso: Bellissimo riglievo
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: At center wreath with fruit surrounds circular figurative composition. Wreath held up by pair of standing angels flanking it and two seated putti below supporting it. Composition seems to be part of frieze.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sketchbook Folio, "Two Standing Angels Holding Wreath", 1810–20.
1810–20. Pen and brown ink, brown wash, over black chalk on white laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-3510.
